title: TypeTrust Co-Founder's 29 Per Cent Off Leap-day Special!
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080304034628/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 28.Feb.2008 11.07pm 

Save 29% on all Typefaces designed by TypeTrust co-founders Neil Summerour & Silas Dilworth! One Day Only\* February 29th!

\*12am GMT, February 29 through 12am GMT, March 2)

Summerour’s Typefaces  
 [http://www.typetrust.com/designer/neilsummerour](http://web.archive.org/web/20080304034628/http:/www.typetrust.com/designer/neilsummerour "http://www.typetrust.com/designer/neilsummerour")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080304034628im_/http:/typophile.com/files/summerour_6403.jpg)

Dilworth’s Typefaces  
 [http://www.typetrust.com/designer/silasdilworth](http://web.archive.org/web/20080304034628/http:/www.typetrust.com/designer/silasdilworth "http://www.typetrust.com/designer/silasdilworth")

author: Miss Tiffany
